General.Name: Quanta Storage
General.Description: Quanta Storage Inc., together with its subsidiaries, researches, develops, produces, manufactures, and sells data storage and processing equipment in Mainland China, Thailand, Japan, the United States, and internationally. The company offers storage and peripheral products, such as NAS, DAS, USB-C power delivery and mini docks, adapters, and Wi-Fi storage products. It also provides solid state drives and intelligent automation systems; and storage manufacturing services for storage devices and systems, computer peripherals, and IoT related products. In addition, the company offers project planning, product development, technical, design, engineering mechanism, electrical engineering, logistics management, and repair and maintenance services. Further, it manufactures and sells computer storage devices, components of peripherals, and industrial collaborative robots; and engages in factory automation planning, installation, and implementation. Quanta Storage Inc. was incorporated in 1999 and is headquartered in Taoyuan, Taiwan.
